name: Intergalactic Battle (2D Shooter)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project for CAS 117. 

I made the following modifications:

- Modified the main menu design by adding a background and moving asteroids

- Modified the instructions page and tweaked other UI pages

- Added additional levels (up to level 4) that get progressively more difficult and with different obstacles

Created by Audrey Parsons.
